name: Dark Maiden: The Last Dream
description:
Thank you so much for downloading “Dark Maiden: The Last Dream.” 

This game is a prologue of sorts for my upcoming RPG, “Dark Maiden: Sojourners”

ART

The art assets for this game were drawn by Ocean’s Dream and are 8-bit reinterpretations of RTP characters from the RPG Maker series of game engines. Part of my motivation for this game is to try to tell a rich, emotional story with these characters in tribute to the wonderful engine it was programmed in.

BGM

Composed by Aaron Krogh 

With tracks by North Sound

CREDITS

Directed, Designed, and Programmed by Alexander Oladokun

Scenario by Alexander Oladokun

Written by Alexander Oladokun

Art- Ocean’s Dream

FONTS USED

Orange Kid: by Codeman38

PixelRunes: by Pixel Saga

This game is dedicated to the memory of Jane Makuta, my dear friend and mentor.

DARK MAIDEN: THE LAST DREAM
